name: Christmas Beauty Salon Makeup
description:
Beauty Salon Christmas Makeup is intended for every girls that wants to enjoy makeup games. Christmas make up games may give you beautiful ideas for this year’s Christmas. They enhance Christmas spirit as well. It is one of the coolest make up games for kids.
*Fully FEATURED make up game*
We’ve included tons of objects, details and makeups in order to offer you the complete makeover, dress up and make up game. This is one of the most complete and creative makeover games.
*Christmas make up INSPIRED*
Beauty Salon Christmas Makeup provides you with best xmas dress ideas, decent hair styles, glittering makeup, everything you need to make your princess get ready for Christmas eve part. Christmas party makeup features will enable you to make your girls as pretty as a music or movie star.
*GIRLS Make Up and Dress Up*
Beatty salon games like this one are suited for girls that want to enjoy making over and creating make up from nothing. Girls makeup is much easier when there are tons of different make up to choose from. Utilize the different colors, brushes, dresses and make the girl the most beautiful you possibly can. There are different beauty templates, hairstyles and dresses to choose from. Simply choose from the dress up games features and fit them to your liking.
*Colorful INSPIRATION*
Make up games for girls require tons of tools, dresses and colors. We included tons of different hair and dress options and we think we nailed it! You can be easily creative with all the tools included in the game. See if you have the talent to be an artist with the brush and with the clothes.
**Beauty Salon Christmas Makeup FEATURES**
- girls makeup games features and graphics
- easy to play
- Christmas inspired
- Makeup, dresses and various tools for enhancing and making the girl more beautiful
- Intuitive and free
- Different templates and hairstyles
